name: Error Trigger
semantic_context: Triggers the workflow when another workflow has an error
natural_language_description: 这是 Error Trigger 节点。主要用于: Triggers the workflow when another workflow has an error

notice.displayName: This node will trigger when there is an error in another workflow, as long as that workflow is set up to do so. More info
